channel.title: Math on Blue Visual v03

item.title: Cellular Automata Playground
item.description: Overview Cellular Automata has always fascinated me, and as a teenager I even programmed some recreations of Conway’s Game of Life. After getting into Houdini and seeing some beautiful rules or patterns, I wanted a way to play around with rules and create my own artworks. In particular, I was inspired by the concept of multiple rules on a singular canvas. I had seen someone implement this concept poorly, and I wanted to do it better.
